Constructor Detail

PushableBomb

public PushableBomb()
Creates new PushableBomb with a timer that starts with 1 minute

PushableBomb

public PushableBomb(int type)
Creates a new PushableBomb facing the specified direction, one of:
  • PushableBomb.TOP
  • PushableBomb.BOTTOM
  • PushableBomb.LEFT
  • PushableBomb.RIGHT
The facing determines the location of the disarming button.
Parameters:
type - The direction of the disarming button

updatePosition

public void updatePosition()
Description copied from class: MobileElement
Updates the current location based on velocity and heading. This method will ensure the mobile object does not move more than the time specified in its move methods as long as timeLeftToMove is set to the amount of time to move.

For example, if the element has a method declared as:


public void move(int milliseconds)

then the move method should set

timeLeftToMove = milliseconds
Overrides:
updatePosition in class MobileElement

updateVelocity
